programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa "kissaperspektiivista".

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 8. Mita jos sukupuuttoon kuolleita lajeja onkin edelleen olemassa? Villielaimiin erikoistunut biologi Forrest Galante kiertaa maapalloa etsimassa lajeja, jotka muu maailma on jo unohtanut. Tyovalineinaan hanella on huipputeknologiaa seka kaikkiin elaimiin kohdistuva syva tiedonjano. Etsinnat vievat Forrestin kaukaisiin ja joskus vaarallisiinkin paikkoihin. (Extinct Or Alive, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksia vastaan uhmaten kuolemaa ja valittamatta esteista tai seurauksista.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikekumppanukset, parhaat ystavat ja toistensa kovimmat kilpailijat Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing.

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa "kissaperspektiivista".

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 4 osa 7/8. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Mireyan pahin painajainen toteutuu. Russell tutkii isojalan mahdollista vedenalaista kulkureittia.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksia vastaan uhmaten kuolemaa ja valittamatta esteista tai seurauksista.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 9, osa 9. Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 7/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Elainlaakarina Alaskassa
programme.desc: Dee hoitaa hengenvaarallisesta taudista karsivaa chihuahuaa, todella sairasta vasikkaa ja trimmaa papukaijan nokan. Dee ja Ken ottavat perheeseensa seitseman pyortyilevaa vuohea.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: 14-vuotias Jasmine-saukko ei ole oma energinen itsensa. New Yorkin akvaarion hait muuttavat uuteen altaaseen.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Alkaa uusintana. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikekumppanukset, parhaat ystavat ja toistensa kovimmat kilpailijat Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 3. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 4. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Lavigne tekee bionisen leikkauksen pitbullterrierille, jolta on revennyt eturistiside. Uusi elainlaakari Fedke hoitaa kissan pelottavannakoista otokkaista vammaa.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Kausi 1, jakso 13. Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan. (Little Giants, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Bradley ja Billy etsivat lohikaarmeita syvalta Thaimaan sademetsista. Lentava lohikaarme hallitsee viidakon latvustoa, liitelee ja nappaa sitten saaliinsa sukelluspommilla.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa linnoituksen keskiaikaa ihannoivalle pariskunnalle. Korkeasta tornista loytyy pyorea poyta ja valtaistuimet seka ullakko, jonka lattia on lasia.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 7, osa 3. Hermoja raastava Quincy-kissa kakkii lattialle kuin ilkeyttaan. Skylar pelkaa hantaansa ja kay omistajansa kimppuun kymmenia kertoja paivassa. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 7/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Latinotahti Prince Royce tilaa ATM:lta mittatilauksena akvaarion Miamin kartanoaan koristamaan. Wayne ja Brett yrittavat tehda siita mahdollisimman kuninkaallisen.

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Pakkanen kiristyy ja paivat lyhenevat, mika vaikeuttaa ansojen tarkastusta. Edna ottaa ohjat omiin kasiinsa, kun sudet tuhoavat hanen ansansa.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Tweton perheyritys lentaa Alaskassa ankarien luonnonolojen armoilla. He kuljettavat ihmisia ja tavaroita maailman vaikeakulkuisimpien taipaleiden taakse.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Lavigne tekee bionisen leikkauksen pitbullterrierille, jolta on revennyt eturistiside. Uusi elainlaakari Fedke hoitaa kissan pelottavannakoista otokkaista vammaa.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Jaksossa nahdaan pizzaa rakastava mopsi, koira, joka tuhoaa taloa ja takapihaa seka myohemmin talleilta karkaava hevonen, joka vapauttaa myos muut hevoset.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 6/6. Koskettavassa sarjassa ihmiset tekevat kaikkensa, jotta pystyat auttamaan apua tarvitsevia elaimia ympari maailmaa. (Dodo Heroes, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.desc: Koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksia vastaan uhmaten kuolemaa ja valittamatta esteista tai seurauksista.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 5. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: 2. kausi alkaa uusintana. Osa 1. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Pakkanen kiristyy ja paivat lyhenevat, mika vaikeuttaa ansojen tarkastusta. Edna ottaa ohjat omiin kasiinsa, kun sudet tuhoavat hanen ansansa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins

programme.title: Elainlaakarina Alaskassa
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 5. Sarjassa seurataan elainlaakari Dee Thornellin elamaa Alaskan rajaseudulla. Hanen monenkarvaiseen asiakaskuntaansa kuuluu elaimia rekikoirista poroihin ja lemmikkikarhuihin, ja Dee saa henkilokuntineen hoidettavakseen aaritapauksen jos toisenkin. Tarvittaessa apuun riennetaan tiettomien taipaleiden taa niin lentokoneella, moottorikelkalla kuin koirienkin vetamana. (Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 6. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff Youngin kirjoilla Planned Pethood Plus -vastaanotolla on 80 000 asiakasta ja heidan lemmikkiaan. Yksikaan paiva ei siis ole samanlainen!

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Toiminta-ajatuksena on rakentaa toinen toistaan ihmeellisempia akvaarioita!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 5. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Ross hoitaa kukkotappelun kahta osapuolta ja arvioi hyeenan kuntoa elainlaakari Lavignen kanssa. Elainlaakari Blue hoitaa halvaantunutta yorkshirenterrieria.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Rakastetulla bassetilla on sairaus, joka saattaa hankaloittaa elainlaakari Rossin leikkausta. Elainlaakari Lavigne ei halua teknikkoa avukseen oman koiransa leikkaukseen.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 5. Canopy Cat Rescue on erikoistunut puihin kiivenneiden kissojen pelastamiseen. Kun nelijalkainen saadaan vihdoin takaisin tukevasti maanpinnalle alkaa selvitystyo, kenen lemmikki on kyseessa. (Treetop Cat Rescue, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 6/10. Canopy Cat Rescue on erikoistunut puihin kiivenneiden kissojen pelastamiseen. Kun nelijalkainen saadaan vihdoin takaisin tukevasti maanpinnalle alkaa selvitystyo, kenen lemmikki on kyseessa. (Treetop Cat Rescue, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.desc: Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 7, osa 4. Kirsten pelkaa kuollakseen hyokkailevaa kissaansa Gusia. Myrskyn tuhoista pelastettu Katrina-kissa pissailee ympari taloa, ja perhe on jo luopua toivosta. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 8/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff Youngin kirjoilla Planned Pethood Plus -vastaanotolla on 80 000 asiakasta ja heidan lemmikkiaan. Yksikaan paiva ei siis ole samanlainen!

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kausi 6, osa 7. Parhaat ystavat ja kilpakumppanit Wayde King ja Brett Raymer luotsaavat menestyksekasta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing -perheyritysta, jonka osaava tiimi toteuttaa akvaarioharrastajien villeimmatkin unelmat. Tiimin kasissa merenalainen maailma syntyy niin baaritiskin yhteyteen kuin pyramidin muotoon. (Tanked, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Craig OConnell ja Andy Casagrande seilaavat Serenajokea ylavirtaan ja yrittavat selvittaa, miksi nuoret harkahait uivat joelle, ja miten ne valttavat siella elavat krokotiilit.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Luke lennattaa vaarallisia kemikaaleja syrjaiseen kylaan. Kun talvi vaatii ensimmaisen uhrinsa Unalakleetissa, Jim sopii arkun kuljetuksesta.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Rakastetulla bassetilla on sairaus, joka saattaa hankaloittaa elainlaakari Rossin leikkausta. Elainlaakari Lavigne ei halua teknikkoa avukseen oman koiransa leikkaukseen.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Asiantuntijat analysoivat uusia todisteita Chupacabra -nimisen legendaarisen verta imevan pedon olemassaolosta, ja olennosta saattaa olla olemassa jopa kaksi versiota!

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 8/10. Nelja raskaan sarjan kalamiesta ja ystavysta yhdistaa sarjassa voimansa, silla he haluavat olla ensimmaisina kalassa maailman syrjaisimmilla vesilla. Vaikka henki menisi. Paastakseen katkettyjen, mystisten vesien ja niissa piileskelevien tarunhohtoisten kalojen luo Chris, Thad, Brian ja Jay joutuvat mm. istumaan ratissa ajotunteja laskematta, taittamaan taivalta kiikkeralla lautalla ja raivaamaan tietaan kesyttomassa viidakossa. (Fish or Die, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksia vastaan uhmaten kuolemaa ja valittamatta esteista tai seuraamuksista.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Yhdysvaltain suurinta akvaarioyritysta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing. Toiminta-ajatuksena on rakentaa toinen toistaan ihmeellisempia akvaarioita!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 2. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 3. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Craig OConnell ja Andy Casagrande seilaavat Serenajokea ylavirtaan ja yrittavat selvittaa, miksi nuoret harkahait uivat joelle, ja miten ne valttavat siella elavat krokotiilit.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: In California, its a vacation from hell as hundreds of campers flee a rampaging wildfire. A rare tornado crashes through the Czech Republic and its sink or swim for a solo adventurer as he attempts to row the perilous Pacific.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: Joanna heads towards the Danube Delta, one of the last great wilderness areas remaining in Europe, full of birdlife including the majestic Pelican. At the mouth of the river, on Romanias Black Sea coast, Joanna bids farewell to the Danube and reflects on her amazing journey.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans must capitalize on the resources of the Arctic Summer.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads Down Under to meet Bette, an elderly woman living alone in a ramshackle house in the wilds of northern Queensland. She is a no-nonsense personality and refuses to cook Ben any dinner. But as the week progresses she warms to her guest and explains what drew her to the harsh Australian wilderness 30 years ago. She also talks about her complex relationship with men, and reveals how she has been seriously threatened when defending the natural world around her from development.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Naturalist Chris Packham investigates the impact a growing human population is having on the planet, asking whether the earth can sustain predictions of ten billion people by 2050.

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: A recent report published by NOAA and NASA con rmed that 2010 to 2019 was the hottest decade since record keeping began 140 years ago. In July of 2018, new temperature records were set around the world and Death Valley experienced the hottest month ever recorded on earth. 2/8

programme.title: Mammals: Making Of
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the series that explores the most successful animal group on Earth, from the tiny Etruscan shrew to the largest mammal in existence - the blue whale.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: In California, its a vacation from hell as hundreds of campers flee a rampaging wildfire. A rare tornado crashes through the Czech Republic and its sink or swim for a solo adventurer as he attempts to row the perilous Pacific.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve crosses the parched desert of southern Africa, tracking wildebeest with the famous hunter gatherers of the Kalahari before heading to the oasis of the Okavango Delta.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben spends time with 40-year-old French-Canadian Julien, on the Thai border with Myanmar.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans confront the environment, and themselves, as winter bears down.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a bakery that produces 180,000 Cornish pasties a day, and discovers the very specific rule one of the pastries must comply with to genuinely be considered Cornish. Ruth Goodman debunks some myths about pasties and investigates the history of the pepper trade, while Cherry Healey learns about the science of onions - including why cutting them can bring tears to the eyes.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: An orphaned baby triceratops must outwit a deadly T-rex. Today, paleontologists are uncovering her remains, allowing us to bring her story to life with stunning VFX.

programme.title: Hurricane Man
programme.desc: Josh takes his British documentary team into their first typhoon, and his novice chasers face a twin threat from Typhoon Soulik, and hot on its heels - Typhoon Cimaron.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
programme.desc: The rollercoaster has been sending our hearts racing and stomachs dropping for over a century, and today, millions of us get our kicks on these topsy-turvy, dare-devil joyriders. Hannah gets the inside story on the UKs newest, tallest and fastest rollercoaster Thorpe Parks Hyperia. She uncovers the wild origins of the modern-day coaster and finds out how some dodgy French physics in the 19th century, NASA rocket scientists and an ambitious cartoonist called Walt delivered the ultimate thrill machine.

programme.title: Paddy and Chris: Road Tripping
programme.desc: Paddy and Chris head to Sweden to get back to nature and embody friluftsliv. It can lower stress and improve mental health, but can they embrace nature to get the reboot needed? 1/3

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans rediscover old practises to get through the heart of winter.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben joins adventurer Randi, who was the first Norwegian woman to climb Everest.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: At the edge of the Moroccan Sahara, an international team of palaeontologists lead by Dr Nizar Ibrahim has uncovered the bones of one of the largest predatory dinosaurs that ever walked the Earth: a Spinosaurus.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is in Essex at an enormous cereal bar factory, which produces 400,000 fruit- and nut-packed treats a day.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The warm season provides for Alaskans.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: A couple from Salt Lake City, Utah, decide to move to the mountainous coast of Shelter Cove, California.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael goes on an epic rail journey from Lucknow in Uttar Pradesh to Kolkata, West Bengal.

programme.title: Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Ed Gamble and Lou Sanders have been friends for years, so much so that shes bought a his n hers set of driving gloves to tackle their most dangerous road - 1000 kilometres of Iceland. 5/8

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: A flash flood in Australia leaves a family running scared. In Wisconsin, a woman and her dog risk getting swept under the ice and a tornado forces a man to take cover in Vancouver.

programme.title: Secrets of the Jurassic Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Liz Bonnin joins an international team of palaeontologists in the remote badlands of Wyoming as they investigate a mysterious dinosaur graveyard. Packed with over a dozen skeletons, including predators such as the fearsome Allosaurus and iconic giants like Diplodocus, as well as fossilised plants and footprints, the site is a treasure trove that is helping to change the way we think about the Jurassic - the golden age of dinosaurs. The astonishing evidence also helps the team to answer why so many dinosaurs came here and what killed them in such great numbers 150 million years ago.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle revisits Rauri on Rathlin Island, who left HR for off-grid life. They repaint Rauris house and discuss his health struggles, and a daring journey he made to help those in need.

programme.title: Hurricane Man
programme.desc: Josh and his documentary team are in the wake of Typhoon Cimaron in Japan, as Hurricane Lane explodes onto the scene, barrelling towards Hawaii and threatening historic landfall.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
programme.desc: Our fridges have been quietly keeping things cool in the kitchen for over a hundred years. Hannah hits the production line with appliance giants Bosch to find the life-blood at the heart of fridges. 4/5

programme.title: Paddy and Chris: Road Tripping
programme.desc: The second leg of Paddy and Chriss European health quest takes them to Ikaria, the island of longevity. They road-test the lifestyle and their mettle in seeking the secrets to a longer life. 2/3

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans take advantage of a brief reprieve from Dark Winters wrath.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to the vast forests of the Rhodope Mountains in Bulgaria to join Miriam and Peter, a couple who have chosen life as nomads, hiking through some of the worlds most striking wildernesses.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Utah, 130 million years ago. A band of armoured dinosaurs battle to reach adulthood, pursued by some of the most formidable predators that have ever lived: Utahraptors.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a soup factory in Wigan that produces 2.5 million cans a day, and follows the production of a tin of vegetable soup from a pea harvest to the eventual dispatch. He also encounters a pressure cooker that stands 27.4 metres tall. Cherry Healey compares the vitamin content of fresh and frozen vegetables, and visits a salt mine in Crewe, while historian Ruth Goodman cooks up a butterted spinach soup using a recipe from a 17th-century cookbook, which is the earliest known reference to soup in English.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans are in the home stretch of preparing for the upcoming winter.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben spends time with Rob, a man he previously met living in Californias Slab City, and his 18-year-old son Damien, to experience what it is like to be homeless in the wild. Together, they dig a toilet, go fishing for crayfish, kayak the school run, and cut firewood for their campfire dinners.

programme.title: Scandinavia with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: On the last leg of his Scandinavian journey, Simon uncovers the surprising and sometimes shocking side of Sweden and Denmark, two of the happiest and wealthiest countries on earth.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: A wind driven wildfire consumes a Colorado neighbourhood. In New Mexico, freezing conditions trap 21 people in an ice-covered tram car and an outbreak of tornados, rip through communities in the state of Alabama.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Firefighters battle through apocalyptic scenes on Australias Kangaroo Island as it is besieged by deadly bushfires. In Kansas, two hard-core tornado chasers allow a tourist to ride along with them.

programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe charges off into the foggy swamp to find some turnips but finds the feared Bog Lady instead! Bert gets enchanted by the Queen of the Mist.

programme.desc: When Prince Ivandoe discovers a secret chest, guarded by a three headed knight, he is certain the Golden Feather lies within. However it turns out quite a different sort of feathery fellow lies within!

programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to tear themselves away from the internet, but end up falling down the Elmore Stream-hole. / Gumball and Darwin try to find a single nice quality about their neighbour, Mrs Robinson.

programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to tear themselves away from the internet, but end up falling down the Elmore Stream-hole. / Gumball and Darwin try to find a single nice quality about their neighbour, Mrs Robinson.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After being framed for feeding coffee to the squirrels in the park, Gumball proclaims that Mrs Robinson is pure evil. Darwin tells him that theres no such thing as pure evil, and sets out to prove that Mrs Robinson wasnt born evil, she just became that way because of a trauma in her past. But when he learns the true darkness of her nature, he decides she deserves her grand comeuppance.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After being framed for feeding coffee to the squirrels in the park, Gumball proclaims that Mrs Robinson is pure evil. programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes man overboard and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is over-joyed when his weevil friend, Chase, returns to Mushton. But Chase seems to have changed, hes way harder to handle now. And he wants something from Chep! But what?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has to give the Mushlets a talk about spiders. But talking in front of a group makes Chep nervous. Mush-Mush offers to do it instead. Problem is Mush-Mushs knowledge of spiders is so bad he ends up getting caught by one!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers want Amanita to join in telling monster stories. But Amanita doesnt believe in monsters. So they take her on a monster hunt and find more than they imagined.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to be brave enough to join in the daring games that Mush-Mush and Lilit like to play. So he gets some protective moss pants that make him not only indestructible but also fashionable and a bit cocky. Woo, its the new Chep!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush really wants to get over his fear of snakes. Truff really wants to get over his fear of ants. So they team up to help each other overcome their fears ... maybe.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpot offers to look after the Mushies so Mushpie can get a well-earned rest. He thinks it will be easy. It is not easy! The Mushies end up pushing both Mushpot and Starmush to their limit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize an obstacle course in their cabin. Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin and they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: During a fight, Grizzy and the Lemmings stumble upon a Mayan temple lost in the jungle. Once inside, they set off a magic reaction that creates doubles of themselves at different ages. They now have a Grizzy babe and elderly Lemmings. Grizzy tries to get the young bear interested in a documentary on salmon, while the Lemmings want to initiate their ancestors to dance. But age differences are not so easily defeated.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last of the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. When the whistle disappears, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit soon discover that it has been stolen by a beetle. In order to finally hear what a real Nightingale sounds like, theyll have to get it back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers... a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. Mush-Mush wants to be as cool as Mushpot and asks him to lend him his staff of wisdom. But the staff comes with a lot of responsibilities...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. All animals love Chep and no-one knows more about snakes than he does. But this snake is not to be messed with! When they finally sneak into the snake tunnel, they learn why the snake has been acting so strangely...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it. But when Fung and Miff tease him for being scared, he promises that he will do something that no Mushable has ever done before... ride a grasshopper! Chep is in for the ride of his life!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Its hot out and when Grizzy sees an ice cream commercial on TV, he has a sudden craving. Unfortunately, the Lemmings made it to the deep-freeze in the garage before him and emptied it out to make themselves a sled run in the backyard with strawberry-vanilla ice cream. For Grizzy, theres no question that the stock they possessively watch over in an icebox winds up as powder snow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their relaxing holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero Super Spy and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a jar of Yummy which is mysteriously sucked up into a strange gravestone locked with a puzzle. Grizzy smashes open the gravestone but it contains another box made of unbreakable wood protected with a codex system. Our characters crack the code and are sucked into the box in turn. They discover that to get out, they will have to resolve a series of new puzzles, each one more complex than the last.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brings the gang to a fancy Ice Hotel co-owned by her family where a new exhibit of ice age artifacts is opening. Things heat up, however, when a frozen Ice Man thaws out and goes on a rampage inside the hotel. Solving the mystery becomes even more complicated when the gang realizes Daphne may just have ulterior motives for going to the hotel to begin with.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang heads to Shaggys beloved grandmothers Florida retirement home, where they learn a crazed Ape Man has been frightening the elderly residents.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestahs insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage. As they adapt to their temporary home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of what you have.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a giant water slide for Looneyburgs waterpark. He keeps adding onto the design with the support of Bugs until problems arise.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Its Tazs birthday, and the Looney Builders decide to build him a huge ice cream sundae. Porky, however, is paranoid about little mistakes causing delays which could result in the ice cream melting.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid wont shut as its too full of rubbish and by the time hes shut it, theyve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they wont notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landladys vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that its rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and the jewel thief have a lot in common. They are both round and blue. Also they both like accelerating into blind corners. A full-speed collision results in an accidental identity mixup - suddenly the thief finds himself with a real job at the Lab, and poor old Specs is being used as bedding by a hulking prison inmate. When Lamput decides to open up a can of kick-butt, the thief starts to wonder if a life of crime might be safer after all. Specs has no doubt at all where hed prefer to be. Lamput unveils a surprising skill at the kung-fu nerve-pinch. Specs is busted out of the clink, and returns to the life he loves: sprinting alongside his best bud Skinny, constantly failing to catch ol Lamput.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are in the mountains, doing mountainy things. They look through their binoculars and see Lamput in the distance, doing his own mountainy things. GET HIM! After a dramatic chase across the mountain range, Lamput escapes into a cave and the Docs pursue, but its no ordinary cave. Its the home of a very grumpy dragon who loves his beauty sleep! The Docs are captured and Lamput has to come to the rescue to save the day. Luckily for him, his new forest buddies and his specular musical skills might just help in coming up with a solution.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, its chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto embarks on a high-flying chase that creates major mayhem for a bus driver on his way to school. / The Bear is struggling against a greedy moth in his house. Trying to save his magic box he puts it on the porch and Masha finds the magic hat that can make her invisible

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: As Jerry and Tuffy play marbles, Tom throws a soccer ball in their direction and upsets the game. This sparks a chase between Tom and Jerry, and Jerry takes cover in a room that looks like a giant chessboard. As more chess pieces show up, Tom and Jerry attempt their best to outplay them.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is framed for a crime he did not commit and is sent to prison. Jerry works to clear his name.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Because of an injured foot, Rick stays home with Gingers mother, Rosemary, taking care of him. Rosemary brings her infamous fat-free-dairy-free whole wheat gravy, and she quickly puts Rick, Spike and Tom on nutritious diets. Antics and fights break out as Rick and the pets crave real food.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take a case for Toodles cousin in Hawaii, hoping to sneak in some rest and relaxation, but its no vacation. The cousins missing pineapple plant is only the starting place of the investigation as Tom and Jerry track down the culprit in this tropical environment.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toodles the Witch mesmerizes Tom in a haunted castle, and poses a threat to Jerry and Tuffy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After entering Tyke in an agility contest, Spike sets up a course for the puppy in the backyard. Soon, Spike decides the course isnt hard enough and gets Tom to help, bending Tom into pretzel-like positions for Tyke to leap over, through, or into. After all this preparation, Tyke must still make it to the competition on time.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird is convinced that nobody likes his eccentric dance moves, but when Toyman traps Robin behind a dance-themed gauntlet, its up to the rally car to dance his way to victory! / Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from stealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred and the gang are called in to help with a mystery involving a figure from Freds past, Professor Huh? Fred discovers Rose, with whom he learned mystery solving until they had a falling out, has also arrived with her gang.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred and the gang are called in to help with a mystery involving a figure from Freds past Professor Huh? Fred discovers Rose his old childhood friend with whom he learned mystery solving until they had a falling out has also arrived with her gang. The race to see which gang could solve the mystery first is on as the rest of the gang learns theres more to this story than meets the eye and Freds interest in finding Professor Huh? is as personal as it gets.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid wont shut as its too full of rubbish and by the time hes shut it, theyve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they wont notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a jar of Yummy which is mysteriously sucked up into a strange gravestone locked with a puzzle. Grizzy smashes open the gravestone but it contains another box made of unbreakable wood protected with a codex system. Our characters crack the code and are sucked into the box in turn. They discover that to get out, they will have to resolve a series of new puzzles, each one more complex than the last.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share, Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. Amidst the debris, they discover a strange pack: an army tent with all the necessary equipment to recreate a "home" in nature. Its the chance to discover the joys of camping in the wild.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it. They spray a bit of the water of youth onto Grizzy and he instantly turns into a harmless cub they can easily rid themselves of. But the effects of the waters are only temporary.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings... clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick blames Tom for letting a cricket into the house and tells him he must get rid of it or hell be sleeping outside. programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toms hijinks take a turn for the worse when he realises hes made a paper airplane out of Gingers great-great grandmothers treasured fruitcake recipe.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Jerry ventures out of his hole for a late night snack, Tom has a trap set for him. Unfortunately for Tom, he falls into his own trap and gets his head stuck through the wall and into Jerrys house. Jerry tries everything he can to dislodge Tom, and almost gives up hope of ever getting his privacy back.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

After a battle for the food, Tom steals Little Quackers fortune cookie and gets the best fortune ever!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its the hottest day ever and Spike is building a swimming pool for his son Tyke. When Tom and Jerry get kicked out of the house for being too destructive, Spike asks for their help. But when Tom and Jerry fail to do things the right way, Spike must do everything he can to keep from losing his temper in front of Tyke.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid wont shut as its too full of rubbish and by the time hes shut it, theyve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they wont notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean panics when a monster appears in his cake mixbut its a baby bird that grows into a huge stork, soon taking over his entire home!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guys making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signals one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about what theyd like to do when they grow up.

programme.desc: The Mouse Sisters hire The Looney Builders to build a cheese cafe featuring a mural by Sylvester who is having a bad day.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders build Taz a wrecking ball vehicle, he struggles to learn how to operate it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a large silkworm that produces an extremely soft and resilient elastic thread ad infinitum. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a crate of cell phones: theres one for everyone. But before being able to play with their new toys, they need to charge the batteries. This operation uses all the electricity stored in the cabins solar battery and prevents Grizzy from watching TV. Grizzy soon realizes that this is the least of his worries, for living with the Lemmings and their phones is a guaranteed nonstop stream of noise pollution.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In an accident during a chase, Lamput ends up getting stuck to Specs! Since they are literally inseparable, they bond over time until Boss commands Specs to return to the Lab.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is stuck in the lab with a dangerous robot on the loose! Its up to the combined effort of the two Docs and the entire Lab team to save him before it is too late.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - dont worry, well have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irmas brochure a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean settles in for dinner and TV, but his cozy night ends in chaos when a spring-loaded sofa launches him out of relaxationand off his seat.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet but it wont appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but its useless he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesnt miss the comet

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctors outfit with stethoscope great Teddy - Ill give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking hes a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before hes found out?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Its Scoobys dream come true as the gang visits the set of his favorite TV show and he meets the star, his celebrity crush, a dog actress who plays a detective on the screen. Now all Scooby has to do is work up the courage to actually talk to her while also solving the mystery of the monstrous Gargoyle attacking the production!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om het mysterie op te lossen van de enge Crystal Crawler - een vleermuisachtig monster - moet de gang de Crystal Canopy in - een doolhof van complexe kristalformaties. Om het nog erger te maken, kunnen ze niet praten in de Canopy, omdat zelfs het kleinste beetje geluid ervoor kan zorgen dat alle kristallen om hen heen zullen vallen.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a kitten that she will foster until she finds it a forever home. Everyone in the house falls in love with the kitten, except for Tom. When Spike and Jerry see that Tom has become a bad influence on the kitten, a dragged-out fight ensues. The only thing that ends it is the news that the kitten has a new home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Fed up with Toms cat hair, Rick buys the "Suck-Up," a next level Roomba-like cleaner. The Suck-Up patrols the house and cleans nonstop. At first, Tom enjoys the little modern mechanical marvel using it to clean Jerry out of house and home! But when the self-programming machine turns on them both and takes over the house -- Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its picture day! Spike and Tom end up covered in mud and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. A fight leads to a runaway van and a bath they both wanted to avoid. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this years picture.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom gets Spike sent to obedience school and Jerry is left without a protector. When Spike returns Tom tries hard to get Spike to revert to his old ways. Jerry fights back to make sure that Spike keeps his cool.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters, but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive, he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings find a native American Indian vase with a genie inside that will make anyones dreams come true, if they only let him out by rubbing the vase. There is nonetheless one little snag: the effects of the genies magic instantly wear off as soon as he returns to his vase and the lid shuts.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get their hands on a secret weapon that belongs to the Canadian Army: anyone hit with it becomes non-violent. They use the arm to transform Grizzy into a cherub, despite himself.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When they find a book on Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are all lined up on the couch to watch a cartoon film where a mouse plays nasty tricks on a cat. Grizzy, who has decided to take his nap, switches off the TV and confiscates the batteries of the remote control to make sure they cant switch their program back on. But is it wise to frustrate a gang of Lemmings whove been inspired by a gag-filled cartoon?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: George P. Mandrake hires The Looney Builders to build a T. Rex fossil. / Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China. Bugs worries about letting down his favorite chef.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build her a home in Looneyburg. Lola soon discovers they got the design wrong and the crew has to make adjustments.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Tweety leads the Looney Builders in building a new merry-go-round at the park for the kids. When his crane breaks down, his small size affects his ability to contribute to the build.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders learn that Taz accidentally destroyed his house, so they set out to build him a new one thats smash-proof.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When the Looney Builders build themselves a playground, Daffy gets so excited about his section that he takes all the supplies for himself.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestahs insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman and the mission are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast! But when the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbirds beach day plans, Bam helps him realize that even though things didnt go exactly as planned, they still had a great day!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage. As they adapt to their temporary home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of what you have.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batman refuses to engage Joker in a race, Prank goads Bam into a rematch. Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares and take the high road?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After struggling to solve a riddle from Riddlers helicopter Quizz, Redbird must learn to speak up and share his ideas with the Batwheels. / After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam from a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own No Littering signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.
